entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is in charge of Harry's class.

entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: An annual event at Hogwarts where students dance and socialize.

entities.name: haddock
entities.description: A rubber headless haddock that Harry has in his possession.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall calls out to Harry and speaks with him about the Yule Ball.
Harry is expected to participate in the Yule Ball as a champion.
Professor McGonagall instructs Harry about his role at the Yule Ball.
Harry has a rubber headless haddock in his possession.
